bilingual.source: Do you have an e-mail address?
Hi Mei Ling, Thank you for your e-mail.
Are they yours? E-mail me at maryg2@gfmail.com.
bilingual.target: 这是你的吗？发邮件给我。

bilingual.source: The cost of insured mail is higher than regular mail.
bilingual.target: 保价邮件的费用比普通邮件高一些。
你可以帮我发送邮件吗？
你收到我的电子邮件了吗？

list.abstract: Mail（英[meɪl]，美[meɪl]），英语单词。作名词时，释义为邮件；信件；铠甲。作动词时，释义为邮寄；给…披上铠甲；给…发电子邮件。短语搭配为mail to（邮寄至）。例句为“The quiet heroism of mail delivery.（邮件投递的无声英雄主义。）” 其复数为mails，现在分词为mailing，过去分词为mailed，名词性近义词有armour、dawk，不及物动词近义词有send off、pack off。

yingyinNormal.en: Can I check my e-mail real quick?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我能查下我的邮件吗？很快的。

yingyinNormal.en: This is an e-mail request for Jeremy Barba's murder.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是请人杀害杰里米·巴尔巴的邮件。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, guys. Did you get my mail? Yeah, right here.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好，伙计们。你拿了我的邮件了？是，在这。

yingyinNormal.en: No! Did you text or e-mail? No, I didn't. I... Yes? I left myself a voice mail reminder.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没有。你有没有发短信，或电子邮件？不，我没有，我。怎么？我留了条语音邮件提醒自己。

yingyinNormal.en: It's just hard when I know I have e-mail I can't get.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一想到有电子邮件却收不到，我就心烦。

yingyinNormal.en: I will e-mail you when I have something for you to do.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我需要你的时候，我会给你发电子邮件。

yingyinNormal.en: And he sent you an e-mail about a week ago. Can you read it?
yingyinNormal.zh: 他一周前给你发了封邮件，你能读一下吗？

yingyinNormal.en: How did they contact you, the leaders of Silk Road? Through e-mail.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们怎么联系你的，丝路的高层？发邮件联系。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay. Well, thank you for getting my mail. No problem. welcome home.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好的，谢谢你替我拿邮件。小意思，欢迎回家。

yingyinNormal.en: So I have until then to figure out how to delete it. Because if this person sees this e-mail, it'll be horrible.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以在那儿之前我必须想办法怎样删除这封邮件，因为这个人看到了这封邮件，情况难以想象。

yingyinNormal.en: Now move it down to your e-mail icon. Yeah, the little envelope.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在把指针移到电子邮件图标上，对，就是那个小信封图标。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, Sheldon sent us all an e-mail. "Happy holidays from Texas."
yingyinNormal.zh: 谢尔顿给我们都发了封邮件，主题是"来自德州的节日问候"。

yingyinNormal.en: You know, since I moved last year, not all my mail has been forwarded.
yingyinNormal.zh: 知道吗，从我去年搬来以后，不是所有的邮件都被转寄掉。

yingyinNormal.en: The email I read said administrative aid. Nope, mail room. I'm gonna go.
yingyinNormal.zh: 邮件上说职位是行政助理？不，是收发室。我还是告辞了。

yingyinNormal.en: There you go. Now any e-mail from Wolowitz will go right into your spam folder.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好了，现在所有沃尔伍兹发来的邮件都会直接进入垃圾箱。

yingyinNormal.en: So the yogurt didn't work. I'll fire off a critical e-mail to the manufacturer.
yingyinNormal.zh: 看来酸奶是没起作用，我要火速去给生产商写邮件指责他们。

yingyinNormal.en: All right, just give her some space, all right? Don't call, don't text, don't e-mail.
yingyinNormal.zh: 给她一点空间就行了？别打电话，别发短信，别发邮件。

yingyinNormal.en: I accidentally sent an e-mail to the wrong person, and she's at work right now.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不小心把一封邮件发给不该发的人，而且，她现在正在工作。

yingyinNormal.en: She's got me doing butt clenches at my desk. And now, they won't bring me my mail anymore.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她叫我在公司做收臀运动，现在，他们不再送邮件给我了。

yingyinNormal.en: He didn't respond to my E-mail, his phone number is unlisted. Tell me what my other option was.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他没回复我的邮件，我又不知道他的电话，那我还能怎么办。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: letters and packages conveyed by the postal system

examination_example.sentence: Fundamentally, the USPS is in a historic squeeze between technological change that has permanently decreased demand for its bread-and-butter product, first-class <highlight>mail</highlight>, and a regulatory structure.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从根本上说，美国邮政管理局（USPS）正处于永久性地降低了对其维持生计的产品和头等邮件需求的技术变革和监管结构之间的“历史性挤压”中。
吸引更多的一级邮件用户

examination_example.sentence: A fabulous machine could function as a typewriter and printing press, studio and theatre, the <highlight>mail</highlight> as well as the <highlight>mail</highlight> carrier.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一个出色的机器可以用作打字机和印刷机，工作室和剧院，邮件以及邮递员。

examination_example.sentence: The restaurant <highlight>mailed</highlight> the ring back to the happy couple.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 饭店把戒指寄还给了这对幸福的夫妇。

examination_example.sentence: As a Daily <highlight>Mail</highlight> story put it, that "hot oatmeal (燕麦粥) breakfast keeps you full for longer."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 正如《每日邮报》的一篇报道所说，“热燕麦粥早餐能让你更长时间地处于饱腹状态。”

exam_freq_info.chinese: 邮件; 邮包; 信件

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

examination_example.sentence: It was absolutely out of control, thousands of e-<highlight>mails</highlight>, people around the world sharing their stories of travel.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 数千封电子邮件，全世界的人们分享他们的旅行故事，彻底失控了。

examination_example.sentence: E-<highlight>mails</highlight> are then sent to the BookCrossing to keep them updated about where their books have been found.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后，电子邮件会被发送到“图书漂流”网站，让他们随时了解自己的书在哪里被找到。

examination_example.sentence: By tracking people's e-<highlight>mails</highlight> and online posts, scientists have found that good news can spread faster and farther than disasters and sob stories.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 通过跟踪人们的电子邮件和在线帖子，科学家发现好消息比灾难和悲伤的故事传播得更快更远。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. 邮件；信件；邮包；锁子甲；铠甲；邮政；邮件发送；邮袋；邮政列车；邮件收取

examination_example.sentence: When I went to my beach house, Nicole helped pick up my <highlight>mail</highlight> and water my plants.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我去我的海滨别墅时，妮可帮我收邮件和给植物浇水。

examination_example.sentence: For the villages, the flowers were more enjoyable than any <highlight>mail</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对于村庄来说，这些花比任何邮件都更令人愉快。

examination_example.sentence: Flying robots can carry <highlight>mails</highlight> to people's houses.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 飞行机器人能把邮件送到人们家里。

examination_example.sentence: All those who wish to have a go can <highlight>mail</highlight> their articles to xysmagazine@gmail.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所有想要去尝试的人可以把他们的文章寄到xysmagazine@gmail.
